name: RatAttack - WebGL
description:
WebGL Build does not have saves implemented.

To level up your Rat, download the PC build below. 

You have from 12:00am to 6:00am 

Journey through the early morning in an apartment building, slaying enemies and stealing food until the sun comes up. How many floors can you make it before the sun comes up, or will your mouse warming party be squashed short?
